title: Driver tries to save baby by THROWING it onto a bridge after his car crashes into water
text:
This is the shocking moment a driver tries to save his child by throwing him at a bridge after his car was knocked off the road and into water.

CCTV footage shows a white car driving across a narrow bridge in Madhya Pradesh, central India, before it collides with a red truck.

The two vehicles smash into each other and the car veers off course before ramming into a bollard.

CCTV footage shows a white car driving across a narrow bridge in Madhya Pradesh, central India, before it collides with a red truck

The driver then clambers out of the window before throwing one of his children towards people who have gathered on the bridge

The bollard crumbles from the force of the car and the vehicle is then sent over the edge of the bridge.

It turns in the air and lands in the water with a splash.

A driver's head pokes out the window as he struggles to get one child out. He then stands on the bonnet as he throws his child towards the bridge.

Locals who'd gathered to help attempted to catch his child, but missed by inches as the child bounced off the side of the bridge and fell back into the water.

The child falls just short of outstretched hands and falls back into the water before the people on the bridge can catch it

The family was rescued and sent to hospital, where they are undergoing treatment

One person jumps in and helps rescue the other trapped family members, as a second throws a long red cloth into the water to pull them out.

Amidst the chaos caused by yesterday's collision in the Niwari Vidhan Sabha constituency, the red truck drives away out of sight.

The family was rescued and sent to hospital, where they are undergoing treatment.
description: CCTV footage shows the car driving on a narrow bridge in Madhya Pradesh, India, before it collides with a red truck. The driver then tries to throw his child to people on the bridge but misses.
